name: elixir
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 PP for each move.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Restores the PP
of all moves by 10.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Restores the PP
of all moves by 10.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Restores the PP of all moves for
one POKéMON by 10 points each.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
It restores the PP of all the
moves learned by the targeted Pokémon
by 10 points each.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
This medicine can restore 10 PP
to each of the moves that have
been learned by a Pokémon.

This medicine can restore 10 PP to each of the
